snippet.title: Immortal Hunters 1.0 | Release Date Announcement | indie.io
snippet.description:
Begin your hunt on February 17th  when Immortal Hunters launches into 1.0 on Steam! 

Play in Early Access
 ➤https://bit.ly/ImmortalHunters

The world is on the brink of annihilation. The Church wields the power of a dead god, but the truth lies buried in the ruins of humanity. As an Immortal Hunter, battle through the Apocalypse in a tactical RPG beat 'em up, defy fate, and uncover the rebirth of divinity before it's too late.
 
Visit indie.io on Steam 
➤https://bit.ly/4e91q5q

#indiegames #pcgaming #rpg
